item.title: Pod Juice X Raz Gush Edition Strawberry Peach Gush Nic Salt E-juice 30ml
item.description:
Pod Juice X Raz Gush Edition Strawberry Peach Gush Nic SaltE-juice

Pod Juice Raz Gush Edition Strawberry Peach Gush Vape Juice INTRODUCTION

Pod Juice X Raz Gush Edition Strawberry Peach Gush Nic Salt E-juice boasts 30ml nicotine salt e-juice in a portable chubby gorilla bottle. This premium vape juice is the collaboration between Raz and Pod Juice to replicate the beloved disposable vape flavor. You can expect the juicy strawberry taste with sweet peach flavor. The well-balanced fruity flavor is soothing and tasty. Pod Juice X Raz Gush Edition Strawberry Peach Gush Nic Salt E-juice is the best choice to enjoy disposable vape flavors with a refillable vape.

• Nicotine Type: Nicotine Salt

item.title: Olit Hookalit Mega 150K Disposable Hookah Head 80ml 0.35% (150000 Puffs)
item.description:
Olit Hookalit Mega 150KDisposable Hookah

Olit Hookalit Mega 150K Disposable E-hookah INTRODUCTION

Olit Hookalit Mega 150K Disposable hookah Pen  is the first disposable e-hookah decveloped by Olit. It can be used as a standalone disposable e-hookah or a hookah head for traditional hookahs. Olit Hookalit Mega 150000 vape, like other Olit vapes, offers an incredibly high amount of e-juice (up to 80ml). The 0.35% nicotine strength is low enough for satisfying and smooth DTL vaping. The digital display also shows the power and e-juice level precisely. Moreover, Olit Hookalit Mega 150K also provides shisha-like sound effects, which makes it suitable for parties.

Features

• Dual Functions: Hookah Head / Disposable E-hookah

• Rechargeable Integrated 1700mAh Battery

• Pre-filled 80ml E-Juice

• Approximately up to 150000 Puffs

• DTL Vaping Supported

• Dual LIT Mesh Coils

• Compatible with Desktop Hookah Devices

• Digital Screen with Battery and E-juice Indicators

• Hookah Sound Effects

• Airflow Control

• Dynamic RGB Lighting

• 0.35% Nicotine Strength

• USB Type-C Charging (Not Included)

With an incredibly large 10ml e-juice capacity, SMOK TFOS Pod System Kit is the ideal starter kit for vapers who want to try refillable kits. Apart from the large pod, the SMOK TFOS Pod Kit is also powered by a durable 1700mAh built-in battery, which supports fast recharging. In front of this vape is the huge and clear 1.86-inch digital display. All the information you need, including the battery power and the output mode, is displayed clearly. Don't forget the two output modes. Norm and Boost Modes shall serve you well and SMOK TFOS is what you need to enjoy vaping.

item.description:
Solobar Mate 35K Disposable Pod

Solobar Mate 35K Pod INTRODUCTION

Solobar Mate 35K Disposable Pod is the replacement pre-filled pod for the Solobar Mate 35K Kit. Each Solobar Mate 35K Pod comes with 24ml vape juice in distinctive flavors. There is no integrated battery in the pod. As a result, you need the battery of the Solobar Mate 35K Full Kit to try different flavors. The 5% nicotine strength is perfect for new vapers, and the tiny size of Solobar Mate 35K Replacement Pods makes it easier to carry around. You will never need to worry about running out of e-juice with a Solobar Mate 35K Pod as a backup.

item.title: Eleaf Melo X Tank 28mm 5ml
item.description:
Eleaf Melo X Tank

Eleaf Melo X INTRODUCTION

Crafted with durable stainless steel, Eleaf Melo X Tank Atomizer is a reliable atomizer designed by Eleaf. It comes with a large 5ml e-liquid capacity for more convenient use. The top airflow control not only offers you smooth flavors but also prevents annoying e-liquid leakage. Moreover, it is also easy to maintain and replace the coils for Eleaf Melo X Tank, as it's compatible with all the Eleaf EC series coils, including the latest EC-D Coils with dual mesh coils. Eleaf Melo X also comes with a large 3.7mm filling port. As a result, you can refill it with ease and combine it with most of your favorite box mods.

Features

• Diameter: 28*52mm

• Vape Juice Capacity: 5ml

• Filling Hole Diameter: 3.7mm

item.title: Eleaf IORE Mix Pod System Kit 1100mAh 24W
item.description:
Eleaf IORE MixPod System Kit

Eleaf IORE MixVape KitINTRODUCTION

Eleaf IORE Mix 2in1 Pod System Kit is the first pod system by Eleaf that comes with a pod cartridge with two separate chambers. You can fill the two detachable chambers with different e-juice and enjoy. This advanced yet simple pod kit runs on a rechargeable 1100mAh battery and supports fast Type-C recharging. There are 4 modes available. You can choose one pod (left or right) to vape or let them work together for a mixed flavor or stronger hits. Eleaf IORE Mix is the best choice to enjoy doubled fun of vaping!

Features

• Dimensions: 105*37*18.5mm

• Vape juice Capacity: 4ml (2ml+2ml)

• Single Pod with 2 Separate Chambers

• Rechargeable 1100mAh Built-in Battery

• Easy Side Filling Design

• 4 Switchable Modes: Right/Left Pod Working Alone, Two Pods Working Together and One Pod Working after the Other

• Output Power: 24 Max

• Indicator Light

• Compatible with Eleaf IORE Mix Pod Cartridge

• Draw-activated

• Type-C Fast Recharging (5V/1A)

Eleaf iStick XC100 Vape Mod Kit is a variation of the Eleaf iSitck X80 Kit. It runs on a detachable 18650 or 21700 battery (not included) instead. As a result, the highest output of the iStick XC100 reaches 100W. Running out of battery is almost impossible, as you can always have a backup battery with you. This powerful vape kit by Eleaf also comes with a 1.05-inch large LED screen, which shows the necessary vaping data, including battery status, output power and the puff count. item.title: Eleaf iStick X80 Vape Mod Kit with Melo X 3200mAh 80W
item.description:
Eleaf iStick X80Vape Mod Kit

Eleaf iStick X80 Vape Kit INTRODUCTION

Eleaf iStick X80 Vape Mod Kit is the latest powerful vaping device developed by Eleaf. It is composed of the Eleaf iStick X80 Box Mod and the novel Eleaf Melo X Tank. The former is powered by an integrated 3200mAh rechargeable battery and the latter can hold as much as 5ml vape juice. Eleaf iStick X80 Vape Mod Kit also shows you the essential information with a huge 1.05-inch TFT screen. It directly and clearly shows you the battery status, output power and how many puffs you have made. You can adjust the output with the press-twist button and control the airflow. Eleaf iStick X80 Kit is a powerful yet simple vape mod kit for newcomers.

Features

• Dimension: 38.7*28.1*134.1mm

• Powered by a Built-in 3200mAh Rechargeable Battery

• Compatible with Eleaf Melo X Tank

• Pod Capacity: 5ml

• Filling Hole Diameter: 3.7mm

• Recommended E-juice: Freebase

• 1.05-inch TFT Screen with Puff Count, Battery Life, Coil Resistance and Animations

• Compatible Coils: Eleaf EC-D Coils and all the Eleaf EC series Coils

• Output Range: 5-80W

• Press-twist Button for Operations and a Lock Slider for Safety

• Precise Airflow Adjustment

• Type-C Fast Recharging (5V/2A)

Eleaf iSolo Air 3Vape KitINTRODUCTION

Eleaf iSolo Air 3 Pod Mod Kit is the third generation of the Eleaf iSolo Air series, featuring a 1600mAh rechargeable battery, 40W max output and a TFT display screen. It comes with the new compatible pod cartridge that can accommodate at most 3ml e-juice. As usual, the Eleaf iSolo Air 3 is compatible with all the Eleaf GTL Coils. You can also change the 510 drip tip. The large TFT screen of this vape is simple and informative, showing the output power and other important data in detail. Choose the brand-new Eleaf iSolo Air 3 and experience the most convenient way of vaping!

item.title: Nevoks APX S1 Lite Pod System Kit 500mAh 30W
item.description:
Nevoks APX S1 LitePod System Kit

Nevoks APX S1 Lite Pen Vape Kit INTRODUCTION

Nevoks APX S1 Lite Pod System Kit is an ultra-lightweight vape pen with eco-friendly designs. It is powered by a 500mAh integrated battery and supports Type-C recharging. The compatible Nevoks APX S1 Pod Cartridge can hold 2ml e-juice in total, which is sufficient for the daily use of new vapers. You can flip the pod cartridge to change the airflow and choose pods with different resistance for stronger throat hits. Also, the Nevoks APX S1 Lite Kit is equipped with a screen with responsive light. You can get the visual feedback when you vape. The simple and reliable Nevoks APX S1 Lite is the ideal vape for beginners.

Features

• Dimensions: 110.7*20.8*11.5mm

• Vape juice Capacity: 2ml

• For MTL Vaping

• Rechargeable 500mAh Built-in Battery

• Easy Side Filling Design

• Real-time Responsive Light

• Output Power: 5-30W

• Flip the Pod for a Different Airflow

• Compatible with Nevoks APX Pod Cartridge

• Draw-activated

• Type-C Fast Recharging (5V/1A)

item.title: Vookah DTL 50K Disposable Vape 5%
item.description:
Vookah DTL 50KDisposable Vape

Vookah DTL 50K Disposable Kit INTRODUCTION

Vookah DTL 50K Disposable Vape is an incredible multi-use disposable vape with 3-level coolness control and an audio feedback system. Vookah DTL disposable vape comes with pre-filled vape juice and a built-in battery for daily use. There are two vaping modes (Smooth and Boost Modes) and 3 ice levels available. You can customize your Vookah DTL 50000 to satisfy your needs for decent DTL vaping. Also, the huge digital display shows you the battery status, e-juice level and the modes you choose. The most surprising feature is the audio feedback system that literally tells you what you have done in detail.

Features

• Pre-filled Vape Juice

• Rechargeable Integrated Battery

• Puff Count: Approximately 50000 Puffs

• 3-level Ice Control: Ice Level Adjuster, One Click to Change Ice Levels

• Interactive Audio Feedback System: (Can Be Turned Off)

• Dual Mesh Coils

• Large Digital Display with Mode and Ice Level Indicators and Battery Life and E-juice Level Indicators

• Adjustable Airflow

• 5%(50mg/ml) Nicotine Strength

• USB Type-C Charging (Cable Not Included)

• Draw-Activated

• Smooth DTL Experience

item.title: AiRMEZ Fox 4in1 120K Disposable Vape 60ml 5% (120000 Puffs)
item.description:
AiRMEZ Fox 4in1 120KDisposable Vape

AiRMEZ Fox 4in1 120K Disposable Kit INTRODUCTION

AiRMEZ Fox 4in1 120K Disposable Vape is a rarely seen 4in1 vape in the US market. Equipped with four separate tanks, AiRMEZ Fox 120K can hold 60ml e-juice in total. You can enjoy at most 4 flavors with 15ml e-liquid for each flavor. All you need to do is lift the drip tip and twist it to any flavor you want according to your mood. The mesh coils in this vape ensure strengthened flavors as well as dense vapor. AiRMEZ Fox 120K 4in1 Disposable Kit is your ideal choice if two flavors can not satisfy your needs.

Features

• Quadruple Flavors in One Vape

• 850mAh Integrated Rechargeable Battery

• Puff Count: Approximately 120000 Puffs (30000 Puffs for Each Flavor)

• E-juice Capacity: 15mL × 4 tanks (Total 60mL)

• Lift the Drip Tip and Twist to Change Flavors

• LCD Display for Flavor Indicator

• 1.0ohm Mesh Coils for Rich Flavors and Dense Vapor

• 5% (50mg/ml) Nicotine Strength

• USB Type-C Charging (Cable Not Included)

item.title: OXVA Xlim Go 2 Pod System Kit 1500mAh 30W
item.description:
OXVA Xlim Go 2Pod System Kit

OXVA Xlim Go 2Pod KitINTRODUCTION

OXVA Xlim Go 2 Pod System Kit is the next-generation of the OXVA Xlim Go Pod System. It is equipped with a more reliable 1500mAh battery with fast recharging. As to the flavor production, Xlim Go 2 comes with the UniTech 2.0 Coil Technology and provides 50% more flavor. The smart wattage selection can detect the coil resistance and choose the best output for you automatically. OXVA Xlim Go 2 displays the battery status in an energy-saving way: a breathing starry light that only works when you vape. If you are a big fan of OXVA Xlim Go, you shouldn't miss the next generation of it!

Features

• Dimensions: 26.4*15*117.4mm

• E-liquid Capacity: 3ml

• Rechargeable Integrated 1500mAh Battery: 30 Minutes to 80% / 5-day Use with 0.8ohm Coil

• UniTech 2.0 Coil Technology: 50% More Flavor and 30% More Use Time

• Stepless Airflow Switch for Adjustment: Tight to Airy

• Hidden Breathing Starry Light: Only Working When You Vape / 3-color Battery Indicator

• 30W Highest Output Power

• For MTL/RDL and Freebase/Nicotine Salt E-juice

• Smart Wattage Selection: Automatic Output Adjustment by Pod Resistance Detection

• Compatible with All the OXVA Xlim Pod Cartridges

• Draw-activated

• Type-C Fast Recharging (Cable Not Included)
